name: Riverside Park
description: Beautiful 50-acre park with walking trails, playgrounds, and picnic areas. Perfect for family outings and outdoor activities.

name: Historic Downtown
description: Charming downtown area with boutique shops, restaurants, and historic architecture dating back to the 19th century.

name: Community Museum
description: Interactive museum showcasing local history, culture, and art. Features rotating exhibits and educational programs.

name: Lakefront Promenade
description: Scenic waterfront area with a paved trail, fishing docks, and stunning views of the lake. Popular for jogging and cycling.

name: Tech Innovation Center
description: State-of-the-art technology hub housing startups, research labs, and coworking spaces. Driving innovation in our community.

name: Farmers Market
description: Weekly market featuring fresh produce, artisanal goods, and local crafts. Open Saturdays from May to October.

name: Performing Arts Center
description: Modern venue hosting concerts, theater productions, and cultural events throughout the year. Home to our community orchestra.

name: Botanical Gardens
description: Lush 30-acre gardens featuring native plants, exotic flowers, and themed gardens. Educational programs and seasonal events.
